This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS The .showPopup() and .hidePopup() work on a popup, for <div popup="" id="boolean">Popup</div>.
PASS The .showPopup() and .hidePopup() work on a popup, for <div popup="">Popup</div>.
PASS The .showPopup() and .hidePopup() work on a popup, for <div popup="auto">Popup</div>.
PASS The .showPopup() and .hidePopup() work on a popup, for <div popup="hint">Popup</div>.
PASS The .showPopup() and .hidePopup() work on a popup, for <div popup="async">Popup</div>.
PASS The .showPopup() and .hidePopup() do NOT work on elements without a 'popup' attribute, <div>Non-popup</div>.
PASS The .showPopup() and .hidePopup() do NOT work on elements without a 'popup' attribute, <div popup="popup">Non-popup</div>.
PASS The .showPopup() and .hidePopup() do NOT work on elements without a 'popup' attribute, <div popup="invalid">Non-popup</div>.
FAIL IDL attribute reflection assert_equals: Attribute for "null" should still get set expected (string) "null" but got (object) null
PASS Popup attribute value should be case insensitive
PASS Changing attribute values for popup should work
PASS Changing attribute values should close open popups
PASS Removing a visible popup=auto element from the document should close the popup
PASS Removing a visible popup=hint element from the document should close the popup
PASS Removing a visible popup=async element from the document should close the popup
Harness: the test ran to completion.
